name: Cram TextMate Bundle
tagline: TextMate Support for the Cram Testing Framework
body:
# Cram Bundle

This [TextMate](https://github.com/textmate/textmate) bundle provides support for [Cram](https://bitheap.org/cram), a functional testing framework for command line applications.

![Cram](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sanssecours/Cram.tmbundle/master/Documentation/Cram.png)

For more information, please take a look at the [ReadMe](https://github.com/sanssecours/Cram.tmbundle/blob/master/ReadMe.md).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
